name: Papeete I'a Ota (Tahitian Fish Salad)
keywords: appetizer, coconut milk, lime juice, salmon, raw, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless fresh salmon fillets
1 3/4 cups freshly squeezed lime juice (approximately 14 limes)
3/4 cup coconut milk (see note and recipe)
Freshly ground white pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the salmon into one-inch, or slightly smaller, cubes. Put the cubes in a mixing bowl and add the lime juice. Refrigerate for at least one and one-half hours.
Drain the salmon and return the cubes to the bowl. Add the coconut milk, salt, pepper, onions and garlic. Stir to blend.
